data.description_html:
A torrent of boiling oil rains down in the area you specify.
Creatures in the area take 4d6 points of scalding (fire) damage from the oil.
Creatures that fail their initial saving throw take an additional 2d6 points of damage in each subsequent round of the spell's duration (up to a maximum of 6 rounds at 18th level).
The oil created by this spell is not itself flammable.
data.duration: 1 round and 1 round/three levels; see text
data.name: Boiling Oil
